item.title: @elonmusk: It‚Äôs not just the Somalis in Minnesota. The Dems opened up our nation to anyone who would come here ...
item.description: It‚Äôs not just the Somalis in Minnesota. The Dems opened up our nation to anyone who would come here and vote for them, in exchange for our tax dollars. They use shell companies to funnel public money to the immigrants, meaning we are slaves that fund the people replacing us. This is why the Dems so desperately don‚Äôt want voter ID. Because they are wittingly engaged in a scheme to let the illegals vote, which allows them to stay in power, which allows them to continue to steal our tax dollars. It‚Äôs all one giant racket, an We the People are the suckers.

item.title: @elonmusk: Humans are hardware. Cultures are software. We have fundamentally the same hardware, but adopt very ...
item.description: Humans are hardware. Cultures are software. We have fundamentally the same hardware, but adopt very different software. Not all software is compatible. America's software is built on universal principles and respect for law. Developing countries often run software that prioritizes tribe, custom, and heritage. That's okay. But it's incompatible. When an immigrant comes to America, they need to choose America's software over the software of the place they're leaving. Otherwise, America gets buggy and dysfunctional. Some countries have software more similar to America - and immigrants from those places will likely have an easier time integrating. That's pattern recognition, not prejudice. But the promise of America is that anyone who adopts our software and adds value to the lives of people already here gets to be here. You don't get to be here just because you want to be here. You need to bring something to the table. Millions of people want to come. We can have empathy for all of them, but we can't accommodate all of them. That's why merit-based immigration is the only rational path forward. Don't let people scare you into silence by calling you racist for recognizing this. This is how citizens of other countries approach their country. Why should America be any different?

item.title: @elonmusk: BREAKING: Starlink‚Äôs Direct to Cell service helped One NZ users send over 7 million texts via satell...
item.description: BREAKING: Starlink‚Äôs Direct to Cell service helped One NZ users send over 7 million texts via satellites across New Zealand this year even in remote spots without regular coverage. More than 700,000 customers are covered and usage spiked during extreme weather and outages.

item.title: @elonmusk: I've been noting scams like what the Somalis in Minnesota are doing as a major source of fraudulent ...
item.description: I've been noting scams like what the Somalis in Minnesota are doing as a major source of fraudulent autism diagnoses for a while now. So much of the apparent 'autism epidemic' is this style of grift.

item.title: @elonmusk: Asmongold goes off on the Minnesota Somali Daycare fraud and how wealthy Americans (and Hasan) defen...
item.description: Asmongold goes off on the Minnesota Somali Daycare fraud and how wealthy Americans (and Hasan) defend it: "Average Americans are tired of having their country rotted out, looted, pillaged by a bunch of random f-ing 3rd worlders and then asked to apologize for it because of something that happened before we were born." "It's outrageous. These insulated, generally white liberals who live in gate communities...they never have to see it."
